title: Hypnosis with a mirror  / MESMERISM & FASCINATION - The power of the gaze / Dr. Marco Paret
description:
Dr. Marco Paret and his students from his non-verbal hypnosis masterclass. They are doing an important exercises - the one with the mirror. The exercise with the mirror is beneficial for developing the gaze, helping us to achieve powerful Fascination technique. Another result is self-hypnosis. Staring at ourselves in a mirror for a long time, without blinking, takes us into a deep hypnotic trance state. In this video, we will learn more secrets about the exercise with the mirror.
